Open-sourced with

We strongly believe, developing technologies in open source is the finest way to work with Best people in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science from all around the Globe.

  • invana-bot

    A web crawler framework that can transform websites into datasets with Crawl, Transform and Index workflow.

  • apache-beam-io-extras

    The missing I/O PTransforms of Apache Beam in python; which already exist in Java SDK based but not yet supported in the official apache-beam module.

  • invana-bot-graph

    CTI Flow editor and visualiser to help build error free CTI flows
